column5: Clark's got a reputation during the border shutdown of being a camp that didn't allow deposits to roll forward or provide refunds. There are historically some unfavorable reviews about them online. Hopefully the service issues are resolved. I have to think that if they were continually bad at service, they would no longer be in business. It will be interesting to see the return report on the trip.
I'll give a report around aug24,about Otatakan lake.cpl's trip my fav,, my number one fishing partner my wife!

My Sister & I are Leaving Tomorrow morning to fly to Minneapolis from Las Vegas. Will drive to Ft Frances,Overnight and head for Clarks on Friday to Fly into Okanse lake Will Post a Report when we get back Larry S
Best wishes for a great trip!

We've got 8 guys flying to MSP tomorrow AM from several places. We'll be in rental cars headed north by 8a. Border crossing by 130p. Fingers crossed border isn't a long wait. Hoping to be to Red Lake by 6p. Long boat ride to camp and arrival by 8p. All grocery and supplies purchased and packed.
Good luck Larry and family and friends. Give us a report when you get home.
Why go out of your way to be a hater? Nevermind I don't care Good luck team and can't wait for some pics and yout report. What a great Adventure
Hope you have a great, safe and enjoyable trip
Best of luck on a great trip. Hope the weather is favorable! Looking forward to the report.
